title: Account in PBE to content creator
body:
Good night to support,

I am a creator of content the Brazilian server, do not currently account PBE, like through this post to contact you to verify the possibility of release of these accounts in the test server for me it would help me a lot in my posts of update on my page because with this account could bring more news to followers on the news to come in the game.

Thank you very much in advance.

replies.body: Thanks for your interest in the PBE!  The environment is mainly for testing purposes with help from the community.  You may sign up for the PBE, but we can't expedite applications.  We also have a [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that provides some more information on how applicants might be selected.  Best of luck with your application!
I don't know what their policy on granting PBE access to content creators is, but you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make your request there.
